results.content: I think even tho the course was beginner friendly, he missed some of the crucial errors that one can face in establishing a Rails environment for web apps.

results.content: Course is good to understand connectivity with Stripe but is a bit fast-paced and could do with switching out some of the incremental page development with more information about e.g. configuring different email templates with Stripe.
results.content_html: Course is good to understand connectivity with Stripe but is a bit fast-paced and could do with switching out some of the incremental page development with more information about e.g. configuring different email templates with Stripe.

results.content: Very good expression. People will want to write rails when they finish this course
results.content_html: Very good expression. People will want to write rails when they finish this course

results.content: So far it's been awesome.  I haven't been able to find a useful tut elsewhere so I paid for this course.  Easy peasy.  However, why not include a shipping form too....  Not everyone is selling a cat picture download.
results.content_html: So far it's been awesome. I haven't been able to find a useful tut elsewhere so I paid for this course. Easy peasy. However, why not include a shipping form too.... Not everyone is selling a cat picture download.

results.content: Just finished , it was great.  I'm new to Ruby on Rails and Stripe and learnt a lot. I will use everything I learnt here in the future !
results.content_html: Just finished , it was great. I'm new to Ruby on Rails and Stripe and learnt a lot. I will use everything I learnt here in the future !
